goal: Unify goal injection across all Claude Code message types and external systems

fields.who: Claude Code sessions, GitHub issues, OpenSpec proposals, Claude Code .md plans, and their respective subtask checklists (session todos, issue body checklists, issue parent/child relationships, OpenSpec todos, plan todos)
fields.what: Inject identical structured goal context into every message, artifact, and checklist item
fields.when: every turn, every hook, every create/update/delete of any artifact; prompt user with soft suggestion to define/hydrate goal when missing or inconsistent across artifacts
fields.where: UserPromptSubmit, PostToolUse, Stop, SessionStart hooks; session todo headers; GitHub issue bodies; OpenSpec proposal bodies; Claude Code .md plan bodies; hooks/src/hooks/goal_injector.ts; hooks/src/hooks/goal_compliance_gate.ts; hooks/src/session/goal_stack.ts
fields.why: maintain focus and traceability across all systems uniformly; ensure no work proceeds without explicit goal alignment
fields.how: shared formatGoalContext() injected via additionalContext in all hook event types using TypeScript hooks and bun runtime
fields.lest: Goal context must not be lost on session restart; must not allow session to stop with non-compliant goal; must not proceed without explicit goal alignment; prevent drift between session goals and artifact checklists; never inject stale or orphaned goals
fields.measuredBy: 100% compliance score on goal_compliance_gate validation; all 11 Task Specification sections validated; tests passing for goal_injector, goal_compliance_gate, bun_enforcer hooks; session restart successfully hydrates goal stack from active-goal.json

summary: Unify goal injection across all Claude Code message types and external systems
